28.eng-name: The Book of Oaths, Muharibin, Qasas (Retaliation), and Diyat (Blood Money)

chapter.ara-name: باب صِحَّةِ الإِقْرَارِ بِالْقَتْلِ وَتَمْكِينِ وَلِيِّ الْقَتِيلِ مِنَ الْقِصَاصِ وَاسْتِحْبَابِ طَلَبِ الْعَفْوِ مِنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: A confession to murder is valid and the heir of the victim is entitled to Qisas, but it is recommended to ask him to let him go
